CustomField.description:
Used in CEI rolloiut. Populated via process builder + flow for chatter/call and workflow rule + field update for outbound emails. Only populated in chatter if the case owner posts.
Date/time of the most recent call/email/chatter post. Created for the customer service console to be leveraged in escalation rules.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When was the last call/email/chatter post?
CustomField.label: Last Activity Date
